title: Pilgrim's Pride Corp. Expands Recall of Poultry Products Due to Possible Foreign Matter Contamination
summary: EDITORS NOTE: This release is being reissued as the third expansion of the April 7, 2016, recall to include additional products and production dates. The first recall 027-2016 on April 7, 2016, recalled 40,780 pounds of fully cooked chicken nugget products. The recall expansion on...
